title: The Reincarnant Dies Once More ~ Alternatively, the Captain’s Decision ~ - Novel Updates
tags: Cosmic Wars   Futuristic Setting   Military   Oneshot   Outer Space   Reincarnation   Resurrection   Scientists   Transported to Another World   War Records
author: Futatsutsu   二筒
description: Whether he was a reincarnator or a transitionist, the pilot who operated the powerful spacecraft and supported the frontline, is dead. Those who are left behind must continue the fight. Even if there is no chance of winning.>
